Plot: In order to ascertain the current situation inside, a supposed medical officer and a GEO team step into the quarantined and ill-fated apartment building.
Title: [Rec] 2
Writer: Jaume Balagueró, Manu Díez, Paco Plaza
Actors: Jonathan D. Mellor, Óscar Zafra, Ariel Casas, Alejandro Casaseca
tomatoConsensus: It lacks the surprising jolt of the first installment, but [REC] 2 almost maintains the original's chilling momentum -- and proves not all horror sequels were made equal.
